data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Gina is the fastest at swimming in her class. She ____ faster ____ all ____ girls, and ____ the ____ too. She ____ also ____ than ____ of ____ older ____ at ____. She loves to swim, and she goes to the pool every day after school.
data.partBlankContent: Gina is the fastest at swimming in her class. She i_ faster th__ all t__ girls, and a__ the bo__ too. She i_ also fas___ than so__ of t__ older gi___ at sch___. She loves to swim, and she goes to the pool every day after school.
data.fullContent: Gina is the fastest at swimming in her class. She is faster than all the girls, and all the boys too. She is also faster than some of the older girls at school. She loves to swim, and she goes to the pool every day after school.
data.answer: 吉娜是班上游泳最快的。她比所有的女孩都快，也比所有的男孩都快。她也比学校里一些大一点的女孩跑得快。她喜欢游泳，每天放学后她都去游泳池。
